optimal_care.description: Keep the refrigerator leveled to ensure proper door alignment and closure
Replace water filter every six months or when flow decreases
Throw away first 24 hours of ice production to avoid odor and taste problems
Clean interior/exterior surfaces with warm water, mild soap and soft cloth
Keep ventilation openings clear of obstruction
Maintain recommended temperature settings: 37째F (3째C) for refrigerator and 0째F (-18째C) for freezer
Properly organize items in climate zones for optimal preservation

support.description: Contact GE Appliances Website: GEAppliances.com (US) or GEAppliances.ca (Canada)
Parts and accessories: GEApplianceparts.com or call 877.959.8688

safety.description: Do not use an extension cord
Keep flammable materials and vapors away from refrigerator
Unplug refrigerator before making repairs or cleaning
Must be properly grounded to a 3-prong outlet

cleaning.description: Use soft, clean cloth or sponge with mild detergent mixed with warm water
DO NOT use abrasive cloths, paper towels, scrubbing sponges, or steel wool pads
DO NOT use window sprays, ammonia, or bleach
DO NOT use cleaners containing chlorine on stainless steel surfaces

maintenance.description: Regular cleaning of interior and exterior surfaces
LED lights should be replaced by authorized technician when needed
One-year limited warranty for parts and labor
